overview: In the struggle for the souls of men, Satan created the most dangerous of all demons, the succubus. The appearance of the succubus is feminine and beautiful. She seduces you, makes your most secret desires come true and makes you a prisoner of your desire. She snatches your soul and takes it with her into the dark realm.  A necromancy ends in a massacre. Tobias is the only one to escape. On a cemetery it comes to the showdown. Once again the fight to the death begins.
title: Sukkubus - Die Nacht der Dämonen
